label: validityPeriod
comment: A specific validity period for this logistics status.
A specified period for which this trade price is valid.

The period of time during which this government registration is valid.

rangeIncludes.comment: A specific period of time such as the length of time between two known date/time points, from a start date onwards, or up to an end date.

domainIncludes.comment: The information relevant to a condition related to a document.
